name: Micro Benefits Financial Consulting (Suzhou) Ltd.
description: Provider of a mobile application designed to offer employee retention and corporate training services. The company's application creates opportunity for employees while improving operational efficiency and employee productivity, enabling businesses to retain their employees and improving its performance.
